title: Yup its Verizon alright
body:
The entire east coast is affected, I suggest y'all stop playing ranked for a while. What I find saddening is how Verizon reps hasn't released an official statement yet. 

http://downdetector.com/status/verizon/map/

replies.body: We're doing our best to get the word out and provide some additional steps that might be able to help, but I like your suggestion too! Please try to stay away from ranked games if possible until this issue dies down, we won't be able to lift or reverse things based on ISP outages unfortunately =(.
